title: Bobby Moynihan ❤️
description:
Bobby Moynihan (Mr. Mayor) and Justin break down Bobby’s time on SNL, including his gutsy audition, the evolution of his hilarious animated show, Loafy, and shares an incredible star-studded Comic-Con story.
